channel.title: Need help with npcs!
channel.description:
hi every1 i use project corrupted base.I don't wanana to leach it :D ;D here is problem when i edited npc drops and when i am trying to run server this happens
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2168) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:548) at server.main(server.java:111) Project Corrupted can any1 pls tell me where is my mistake ??? i tabbed everything right when i open npc handler for abyys i find this
if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2263) { // abyssal leach rand_npc = misc.random(5);
so pls can any1 tell me what do i have to do ????? every1 tyvm :D :D :D :D

item.title: Need help with npcs!
item.dc:creator: @Digital_Hotdogs Digital Hotdogs
item.description:
@Digital_Hotdogs wrote:

You lazy people. Code it your self, here.

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45         at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2168)         at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:548)         at server.main(server.java:111) Project Corrupted can any1 pls tell me where is my mistake ??? i tabbed everything right when i open npc handler for abyys i find this if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2263) { // abyssal leach rand_npc = misc.random(5);

Sorry I have no idea how to help, just putting it in code tags for other people to look.
